price: Ўлиб, тупроқ бўлиб кетганимиздан кейин-а? Бу узоқ қайтишдир.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
